name: Hannah, Pride of the Lightsworn
text:
2 "Lightsworn" monsters
Must be either Fusion Summoned or Special Summoned by tributing the above monsters you control (in which case you do not use "Polymerization"). Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 3 LIGHT monsters from your GY; Set 1 face-up monster on the field face-down. Monsters flipped face-down by this effect cannot change their battle position. Each time a "Lightsworn" monster is sent from the Deck to the GY; Inflict 800 Damage to your opponent. If this card leaves the field: Target 2 "Lightsworn" monsters in your GY; Special Summon them. During your End Phase: Send the top 4 cards of your Deck to the GY.
